member.name: T:Owin.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods provided by the ADFS JWT bearer token middleware.

member.name: M:Owin.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationExtensions.UseActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthentication(Owin.IAppBuilder,Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions)
member.summary: Adds Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS) issued JWT bearer token middleware to your web application pipeline.
member.param: The IAppBuilder passed to your configuration method.
An options class that controls the middleware behavior.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Options to configure the Active Directory Federation Services JWT middleware.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.MetadataEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the WSFed Metadata Endpoint for the Security Token Service JWTs will be issued from.
member.value: The WSFed Metadata Endpoint for the Security Token Service JWTs will be issued from.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.Audience
member.summary: Gets or sets the expected audience for any received JWT token.
member.value: The expected audience for any received JWT token.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.Realm
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication realm.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.Provider
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication provider.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelCertificateValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets the a certificate validator to use to validate the metadata endpoint.
member.remarks: If this property is null then the default certificate checks are performed, validating the subject name and if the signing chain is a trusted party.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets timeout value in for back channel communications with the metadata endpoint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to communicate with the metadata endpoint. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value can be downcast to a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.TokenValidationParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to determine if a token is valid.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryFederationServicesBearerAuthenticationOptions.TokenHandler
member.summary: A System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler designed for creating and validating Json Web Tokens.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.Properties.Resources.Exception_MissingDescriptor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No SecurityTokenServiceType descriptor in metadata..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.Properties.Resources.Exception_OptionMustBeProvided
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' option must be provided..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.ActiveDirectory.Properties.Resources.Exception_ValidatorHandlerMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An ICertificateValidator cannot be specified at the same time as an HttpMessageHandler unless it is a WebRequestHandler..

member.summary: A security token provider which retrieves the issuer and signing tokens from a WSFed metadata endpoint.

member.summary: Gets the issuer the credentials are for.

member.summary: Gets all known security tokens.
